Description: Bowl. Everted rim sherd painted in green, yellow and purple in opaque glaze outside with streaky spots inside with blotches and reticulated panels. Fayyumi wares. Made of earthenware, reddish buff.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Charles Drury Edward Fortnum (?)
Acquisition notes: Paper note accompanying object: "Fragments presented by C. Drun, Fortnum (1887), H. Wallis (1895), etc."
